original_title: Walt Disney's Funny Factory with Mickey, Volume 1
overview: All of the shorts on here feature Mickey Mouse.  Mickey and the Seal (1948)  Mr. Mouse Takes a Trip (1940)  Moose Hunters (1937)  Mickey's Parrot (1938)  The Pointer (1939)  Magician Mickey (1937)  Tugboat Mickey (1940)  R'coon Dawg (1951)
title: Walt Disney's Funny Factory with Mickey, Volume 1
